Religions love in wisedomes worth, the truest beauty, best sets forth... [microform] [by] Ni. Br. ; Simon Passæus sculpsit, L. Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Are to be sould in Popes head Ally by Ioh. Sudbury & Geo. Humble, [London] : [1615]
Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.). Title from first two lines of six-line poem beneath engr. port. of Lucy Russell, Countess of Bedford. Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
